content.text: Learn how to create an image overlay title on hover.
content.html: Learn how to create an image overlay title on hover.

content.text: Hover over the image to see the overlay effect.
content.html: Hover over the image to see the overlay effect.

content.text: How To Create an Overlay Image Title

content.code: My Name is John
content.code_html:
<div class="container">
  <img src="img_avatar.png" alt="Avatar" class="image">
  <div class="overlay">My Name is John</div>
</div>

/* Container

syntax_highlighting.text:
/* Container 
  needed to position the overlay. Adjust the width as needed */

/* When you mouse over the container, fade 
  in the overlay title */

content.code_html:
* {box-sizing: border-box}

/* Container needed to position the overlay. Adjust the width as needed */
.container {
  position: relative;
  width: 50%;
  max-width: 300px;
}

/* Make the image to responsive */
.image {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  height: auto;
}

/* The overlay effect - lays on top of the container and over the image */
.overlay {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  background: rgb(0, 0, 0);
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5); /* Black see-through */
  color: #f1f1f1;
  width: 100%;
  transition: .5s ease;
  opacity:0;
  color: white;
  font-size: 20px;
  padding: 20px;
  text-align: center;
}

/* When you mouse over the container, fade in the overlay title */
.container:hover .overlay {
  opacity: 1;
}

content.text: Tip: Also see other image overlay effects (fade, slide, etc) in our How To - Image Hover Overlay .
content.html: Tip: Also see other image overlay effects (fade, slide, etc) in our How To - Image Hover Overlay.
